meanings.definition: A line on a map marking the boundary between linguistic features.
meanings.sent1: The isoglosses on the map show where languages change.
meanings.sent2: Linguists study isoglosses to understand language variations.
meanings.sent3: The isoglosses on the map danced around, confusing the researchers.
meanings.sent4: The isoglosses acted like invisible walls separating different dialects.
meanings.sent5: The bright red isoglosses on the map made the linguistic boundaries clear.

meanings.definition: The geographical boundary of a particular linguistic feature.
meanings.sent1: The isoglosses between the regions were clearly defined.
meanings.sent2: People living near isoglosses may speak different dialects.
meanings.sent3: The isoglosses decided to take a vacation and disappeared from the map.
meanings.sent4: The isoglosses were like fences keeping languages apart.
meanings.sent5: The isoglosses on the globe highlighted the diversity of languages.
